Signup.imwallet.tutorial.title: imToken tutorial
Signup.imwallet.tutorial.body:
Before you start the KYC, please make sure that you have given imToken app the access to camera. 

If you are using iPhone, in the later step you need to copy the external link and open the link in Safari to continue the facial scan,

Step 1: open imToken app, go to the browser inside the app

Step 2: insert address: www.ovr.ai, click and enter the IBCO page, then click “Join the whitelist”

Step 3: Click on the top of the page “Connect Wallet”

Step 4: connect your imToken wallet, and insert your email address, starting the KYC.

Step 5: upload pictures of your ID document, then do the facial scan (please note, when you place your face into the circle, you need to slowly move around your head)

Staking.title: Staking
Vesting.title: Vesting
Staking.desc.copy:
There are 3 different staking options you can select: no lockup with 10% APY, 3 months lockup with 20% APY and 6 months lockup with 30% APY. 

With no lockup option you can claim both capital and rewards at any moment, rewards will keep accruing for as long as you matain your capital stacked 

With 3 and 6 months lockup options capital will be locked until the end of the selected period while you'll be able to withdraw rewards at any moment. Once the staking period (3 or 6 months) ends you will have to withdraw and stake your capital again in order to continue earning rewards. 

Total staking, total rewards hystorically earned and total claimed rewards are detailed for each of the available staking periods
Vesting.desc.copy:
Select the OVRGn token type yuo own (OVRG, OVRG15, OVRG30)

Select the amount of tokens you want to start vesting and click deposit. Pay attention this is a one way action, once deposited you will not be able to withdraw OVRGn tokens anymore and benefit of double staking rewards.

Total Assigned: the total number of OVR tokens assigned to your address. 1:1 ratio with deposited OVRGn tokens.

Total Vested: total number of OVR tokens that has already vested. Includes already claimed.

Total Claimed: total amount of vested OVR tokens claimed.
Staking.desc.copy.ovr:
There are 3 different staking options you can select: no lockup with 5% APY, 3 months lockup with 10% APY and 6 months lockup with 15% APY. 

With no lockup option you can claim both capital and rewards at any moment, rewards will keep accruing for as long as you matain your capital stacked 

With 3 and 6 months lockup options capital will be locked until the end of the selected period while you'll be able to withdraw rewards at any moment. Once the staking period (3 or 6 months) ends you will have to withdraw and stake your capital again in order to continue earning rewards. 

Total staking, total rewards hystorically earned and total claimed rewards are detailed for each of the available staking periods
